tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicationTracking (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage INT,
  administration_time TIMESTAMP,
  compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    dosage VARCHAR(50),
    frequency VARCHAR(50),
    last_taken TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE medication_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id UUID REFERENCES medications(id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    dose_taken VARCHAR(50),
    compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dosage FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE MedicationRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  dosage_taken FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES Medications(medication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Medication_Log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	date_time TIMESTAMP,
	quantity INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Medications(drug_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Log (
	compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	log_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	compliance_status BOOLEAN,
	note TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES Medication_Log(log_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(100)
);
